entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who is saying goodbye to Harry. She says it has been a pleasure meeting him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person whose spirits are lifted slightly by Fleur's departure.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is a person who is being returned to by Fleur.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is wondering about the Durmstrang students and their ship.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person who did not steer the ship.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who comes to say goodbye to Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is being said goodbye to by Krum.

relationships.description: Ron wonders about the Durmstrang students and their ship.
Karkaroff did not steer the ship.
Krum comes to say goodbye to Hermione.
Ron lets Harry keep a watch for the carriages.
